name: The Field Guide to Evil
summary_text: A feature-length anthology film. They are known as myths, lore, and folktales. Created to give logic to mankind's darkest fears, these stories laid the foundation for what we now know as the horror genre.

name: Midnighters
summary_text: Their marriage was already in trouble. Then came the accident and bad decisions. Their troubles just got so much worse.

name: Autumn Blood
summary_text: High in the mountains, two orphaned children keep their mother's death secret. They survive until the villagers destroy their innocence when they brutally assault the girl. Now, the siblings must protect each other to survive.

name: Smoking/No Smoking
summary_text: An examination of the possible consequences of a certain event.

name: The Barefoot Executive
summary_text: A mailroom clerk and a chimp team up to pick hit TV shows.

name: Wszystko, co kocham
summary_text: Follows four friends in their quest to form a punk band. As workers protests sweep across the country, Janek and Staszek, the sons of a navy man, the rebellious Kazik, and the affluent ...                See full summary »

name: New Town Killers
summary_text: Two private bankers, Alistair and Jamie, who have the world at their feet get their kicks from playing a 12 hour game of hunt, hide and seek with people from the margins of society. Their ...                See full summary »

name: Freeze Me
summary_text: A woman is raped by 3 men. She moves south to Tokyo and 5 years later is about to marry a colleague, when one of the rapists enters her apartment. The other 2 come later.

name: Night of the Demon
summary_text: Professor Nugent and his students try to track down Bigfoot, but end up uncovering something more sinister at work.

name: The Chase
summary_text: Chuck Scott gets a job as chauffeur to tough guy Eddie Roman; but Chuck's involvement with Eddie's fearful wife becomes a nightmare.

name: Abe Lincoln in Illinois
summary_text: Humble Abraham Lincoln gains the respect of his Illinois neighbors, growing in stature and respect until he is elected President in 1860 and departs for Washington.

name: Vitalina Varela
summary_text: A Cape Verdean woman navigates her way through Lisbon, following the scanty physical traces her deceased husband left behind and discovering his secret, illicit life.

name: 20th Century Boys 2: The Last Hope
summary_text: Childhood friends continue their battle against a dangerous cult.

name: National Theatre Live: Fleabag
summary_text: A rip-roaring look at some sort of woman living her sort of life. With family and friendships under strain and a guinea pig cafe struggling to keep afloat, Fleabag suddenly finds herself with nothing to lose.

name: New Waterford Girl
summary_text: A gifted teenager dreaming of life beyond her small town becomes inspired when a 15-year-old girl from New York moves in next door.

name: The Warrior and the Sorceress
summary_text: The mighty warrior, Kain, crosses the barren wastelands of the planet Ura, where two arch enemies, Zeg and the evil degenerate Balcaz, fight incessantly for control of the village's only well.

name: Louisiana Story
summary_text: The idyllic life of a young Cajun boy and his pet raccoon is disrupted when the tranquility of the bayou is broken by an oil well drilling near his home.

name: Going Hollywood
summary_text: A love-struck teacher pursues a radio singer to Hollywood.

name: Two of Us
summary_text: Pensioners Nina and Madeleine have hidden their deep and passionate love for many decades, but their bond is put to the test when they are suddenly unable to move freely between each other's apartments.

name: Cztery noce z Anna
summary_text: A crematorium worker repeatedly breaks into a woman's house at night to help with housework.

name: Mirageman
summary_text: A club bouncer with a dark past and great fighting skills decides to become a superhero.

name: One piece: Nejimaki shima no bôken
summary_text: Relaxing on a cozy beach, the Straw Hat Pirates are taking a rest from their quest. Right until Luffy noticed the Going Merry has been hijacked and sailed off from the beach. This leads ...                See full summary »

name: De fortabte sjæles ø
summary_text: A Danish girl sees her brother's body be taken over by the soul of an 1800s man. A boy and the local, clairvoyant inventor agree to help her. They're up against dark forces and time when they head off to the Island of Lost Souls.

name: I'm Going Home
summary_text: The comfortable daily routines of aging Parisian actor Gilbert Valence, 76, are suddenly shaken when he learns that his wife, daughter, and son-in-law have been killed in a car crash.

name: Bad Girls from Valley High
summary_text: Three snobbish high school girls prematurely age brought on from a curse, a drug (or something) after the arrival of new transfer student whom they believe is connected to a murder they committed a year earlier. A fate worse than death.

name: The Velocity of Gary
summary_text: Ex porn star Valentino and Gary are in love with each other. But Valentino also has a girlfriend. Tragedy hits them, when Valentino collapses and is hospitalized with AIDS.

name: Bhowani Junction
summary_text: Anglo-Indian Victoria Jones seeks her true identity amid the chaos of the British withdrawal from India.

name: In-Lawfully Yours
summary_text: A delightful romantic comedy about entangled in-laws finding new paths and roles with each other.

name: Northern Lights
summary_text: Nate Burns accepts a job as chief of police in Lunacy, Alaska, hoping to to get away from the traumatic death of his partner back in Baltimore. He meets Meg, an independent bush pilot, whose father is found dead in a mountain cave.

name: The Hammer
summary_text: A coming of age drama following the life of Matt Hamill, the first deaf wrestler to win a National Collegiate Wrestling Championship.

name: The Great Gatsby
summary_text: Stock broker Nick Carraway consents to play Cupid for his rich married cousin Daisy Buchanan and her former love, nouveau riche Jay Gatsby.

name: Annamalai
summary_text: A class-divided friendship goes through highs and lows through several decades.

name: Homer and Eddie
summary_text: A mentally disabled man gets help from a sociopath when he tries to reunite with his dying father, who years earlier disowned him.

name: 84C MoPic
summary_text: The title refers to the U.S. Army's former "MOS" (job code) for a combat cameraman. The story follows a unit of American G.I.s in Vietnam, all with different backgrounds and motives for being there, through the lens of his camera.

summary_text: After thirty years in the big corporation, Ugo Fantozzi retires. Suddenly, he needs things to do in everyday life and he tries a number of activities: helping Pina shopping; babysitting ...                See full summary »

summary_text: When the bus company finds itself short-staffed, it is Inspector Blake who comes up with the brilliant idea of employing women drivers. The company is delighted, but the bus crews are horrified and try to get rid of the women.

name: The Ambushers
summary_text: Secret agent Matt Helm must battle foreign spies and a rogue nation's exiled ruler in order to recover a hijacked U.S. government experimental flying saucer.

name: Social Animals
summary_text: A childless, single, broke, stoner attempts to salvage her failing business and love life while falling in love for the first time with a married man.

name: A Cookie Cutter Christmas
summary_text: Two schoolteachers take their rivalry to a new level, while they scramble to win a holiday baking contest and the affections of a handsome single father.

name: Nisos 2: To kynigi tou hamenou thisavrou
summary_text: In Nisos 2 the main actors return to the island following the rumours of a hidden treasure. During their "treasure hunt" a bunch of surprises and unexpected events await them.

summary_text: Russendisko is the story of Wladimir, Andrej and Mischa. Three young Russian friends, who move from Moscow to Berlin in a lucky wave of emigration right after the fall of the Berlin wall. ...                See full summary »

name: Stephanie Daley
summary_text: Pregnant forensic psychologist Lydie Crane is hired to learn the truth behind the case of 16-year-old Stephanie Daley, who is accused of concealing her pregnancy and murdering her infant.

name: Paran daemun
summary_text: Streetwise Jin-a moves into a boarding house run by a small, close-knit family. But her unacceptable behavior threatens to destroy them all.

name: A Very Brady Christmas
summary_text: The entire Brady family manages to overcome personal obstacles to spend a happy holiday together.

name: Queen of Blood

summary_text: Wealthy Edward Morgan becomes charmed with a curly-haired orphan and her pretty older sister Mary and arranges to adopt both under the alias of "Mr. Jones." As he spends more time with them, he soon finds himself falling in love with Mary.

summary_text: A sideshow ventriloquist, midget, and strongman form a conspiracy known as "The Unholy Three" and commit a series of robberies.

name: Woodshock
summary_text: A haunted young woman spirals in the wake of profound loss, torn between her fractured emotional state and the reality-altering effects of a potent cannabinoid drug.

name: 29 Palms
summary_text: This is the story of a bag of money and the people who come into contact with it.

name: China Strike Force
summary_text: Assassination at a charity event in Shanghai has 2 cops follow and fighting the assassin or follow a cute, Japanese woman pick-pocketing the victim. Drugs are involved. Chases with motorcycles, race-cars and helicopter follow.

name: Body Count
summary_text: A group of teens are stalked and killed by a Shaman at a cursed camping site.

name: Angels' Brigade
summary_text: Six sexy women, and a teenage girl, devastate a right-wing militia before doing battle with ruthless drug pushers.

name: The Mighty Peking Man

name: 4D Man
summary_text: A scientist discovers a formula enabling him to pass through solid surfaces, but he also rapidly ages, which forces him to kill humans in order to reverse the aging process by absorbing his victims' energies.

name: I Am Woman
summary_text: The story of 1970s musician and activist Helen Reddy.

name: Oh Mercy!
summary_text: A police chief in northern France tries to solve a case where an old woman was brutally murdered.

name: The Zen Diaries of Garry Shandling
summary_text: Judd Apatow presents an emotional two-part in-depth look at the life, career and complex internal struggles of his loving mentor, the influential stand-up comedian and actor Garry Shandling, based on Shandling's personal diaries.

name: Little Boxes
summary_text: An interracial family struggles to adjust when they move from New York City to a small, predominately white town in Washington State.

name: Evil Things
summary_text: On January 9, 2009, five college students left New York City for a weekend in the country. 48 hours later, all five students have simply vanished without a trace. There were no leads and no evidence - until now.

name: Great Expectations
summary_text: A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.

summary_text: Momo and Yudale take turns mounting Bentzi's foreign buxom cousin, but Yudale and her get stuck together. Momo raises the bar even further by proving the rumors of an accepting older buxom piano tutor, Fritzi. Bentzi looks for love.

summary_text: A young naive American and a cynical older British diplomat disagree over politics in 1952 Vietnam and over a beautiful young native girl.

summary_text: Progressive, reform-minded young warden gets permission to take six surly murderers from prison to dilapidated country farm, to rehabilitate it and themselves through hard work and kindly guidance.

summary_text: The life of Enrico Piaggio and the story of the most famous scooter in the world "VESPA"

summary_text: The Ötztal Alps, more than 5300 years ago. A Neolithic clan has settled near a creek. It is their leader Kelab's responsibility to be the keeper of the group's holy shrine Tineka. While Kelab is hunting, the settlement is attacked.

summary_text: A man suffering from Alzheimer's embarks on a final road trip with his granddaughter.

name: McBain

summary_text: No one picks Egon Olsen up after 8 months in prison. Benny and Kjeld now work at a grocer. Egon decides to steal the DKK6,000,000+ from a criminal's safe alone, before the cops raid the place.

name: The Marriage Escape
summary_text: A middle-aged veterinary surgeon believes his wife pampers him too much. In order to get away from her, he fakes the onset of dementia.

name: The Unholy
summary_text: A hearing-impaired girl is visited by the Virgin Mary and can suddenly hear, speak, and heal the sick. As people flock to witness her miracles, terrifying events unfold. Are they the work of the Virgin Mary or something much more sinister?

name: Maikol Yordan Traveling Lost
summary_text: A Costa Rican farmer, when faced with the prospects of losing his farm, embarks in a journey to Europe to raise enough money to pay his debts meeting new acquaintances, lost relatives and himself.

name: Sanitarium
summary_text: "Sanitarium" is an original series that consists of segments based on particular patients of a mental institution and what drove them to madness.

name: Naked As We Came
summary_text: Love, loss and hope are tumultuously explored amidst a tranquil backdrop and asks us all the question: What is your dream?

name: Kommissarie Späck
summary_text: A dead body is found and police detective Mårten Späck draws the conclusion that a serial suicide killer is at large. Späck with his colleagues Grünvald Karlsson and Irene Snusk suspect a ...                See full summary »

name: The Fields
summary_text: Tells the story of a young boy and his family who are terrorized by an unseen presence.

name: Hooking Up
summary_text: In this over-the-top comedy, the relationships of three girls and fours guys - in affluent, adolescent suburban reality - intersect through the topsy-turvy world of love, power...and hooking up.

name: Beast from Haunted Cave
summary_text: A group of gold thieves pull of a heist and flee into the snowy wilderness, only to be pursued by a horrible, spider-like monster.

name: Fire Over England
summary_text: During the reign of Elizabeth I, a young man's fervent devotion to the crown and to his sweetheart, a lady-in-waiting, lead him to battle for England's victory over the Spanish Armada in 1588.

name: Puerto Ricans in Paris
summary_text: Two Puerto Rican NYPD detectives head to Paris to track down a stolen handbag.

name: Subconscious Cruelty
summary_text: An anthology of horror, consisting of four segments all themed around gory subjects.

name: Profundo carmesí
summary_text: The life of a man who preys on unsuspecting women for a living is changed when he finds an accomplice in the woman who loves and controls him.

name: Thieves and Robbers
summary_text: A playboy who makes a living out of seducing women and stealing their jewellery accidentally witnesses a Mafia murder. He must work together with the man who is constantly trying to catch him, Lt. Alan Parker, in order to save his life.

name: Top End Wedding
summary_text: Lauren and Ned are engaged, they are in love, and they have just ten days to find Lauren's mother who has gone AWOL somewhere in the remote far north of Australia, reunite her parents and pull off their dream wedding.

name: Made in Abyss: Dawn of the Deep Soul
summary_text: Riko, Reg, and their new friend, Nanachi, continue their journey down the Abyss and arrive at the 5th layer. But in order for them to continue to the 6th layer, they must encounter the haunting figure of Nanachi's past: Bondrewd the Novel.

name: George Carlin: Carlin on Campus
summary_text: In his New York City grammar school, George Carlin was known as a "disruptive influence in the classroom." With this concert, the ultimate class clown is back at school at UCLA, making ...                See full summary »

name: Live Nude Girls
summary_text: Georgina throws a sleepover party for her friend Jamie, a moderately successful actress, on the night of Jamie's fiancée's bachelor party. Jill, Jamie, Marcy, Rachel, and Georgina have been...                See full summary »

name: The Duchess and the Dirtwater Fox
summary_text: A female hustler is chasing after rich men, but becomes repeatedly mixed up with a suave con man and card shark through a series of misadventures before falling in love with him.

name: The Gazebo
summary_text: TV writer Elliott Nash buries something under the new gazebo in his suburban backyard. But the nervous man can't let it rest there.

name: Your Past Is Showing
summary_text: A very British comedy about a blackmailer and his victims.

name: Christmas List
summary_text: Isobel plans a storybook Christmas with her boyfriend, including a cottage in the Northwest and a bucket list of holiday traditions. But when he goes AWOL, the list proves challenging and a tempting new romance turns her life upside down.

name: Land and Shade
summary_text: After having left a long time ago, a humble country sugar cane worker returns home to meet his grandson and deal with the hardships his family has been put into.

name: Red Hook Summer
summary_text: A middle-class boy from Atlanta finds his worldview changed as he spends the summer with his deeply religious grandfather in the housing projects of Red Hook, Brooklyn.

name: Tentacolino
summary_text: A group of friends find themselves inside a bathysphere and awake in Atlantis. With the help of the King of Atlantis, they do their best to recover the Titanic.

name: The Hide
summary_text: On the windswept Suffolk mudflats creaks a bird-hide, inside which hovers Roy Tunt, a prematurely aged, mildly obsessive-compulsive birder. With one more sighting - the elusive sociable ...                See full summary »

name: Fall
summary_text: Cab driver Michael and supermodel Sarah fall in love while her gorgeous husband Phillippe is in Madrid for two months.

name: Madness in the Method
summary_text: Jason Mewes, attempting method acting in order to gain more respect for himself in Hollywood, slowly descends into madness.

name: Jealousy
summary_text: As a man leaves his wife and daughter, a series of brief conversations, observed gestures, chance encounters and impulsive acts, tell the story of the relationships that flounder and thrive in the wake of this decision.

name: Treeless Mountain
summary_text: In Seoul, Korea, two sisters must look after each other when their mother leaves them to search for their estranged father.

name: Capturing Mary
summary_text: A young man ushers an older woman into a dark exploration of her past - back to the time when, as a young girl, she met a stranger who affected her life forever.

name: Jacquou le croquant
summary_text: Jacquou is a determined and attractive young man who transforms his vow of vengeance into a struggle against injustice.

name: Mounam Pesiyadhe
summary_text: A Misogynist's attitude towards women and love starts to change after he develops feelings for a woman.

name: Gunpowder, Treason & Plot
summary_text: Mini series depicting the turbulent and bloody reigns of Scottish monarchs Mary, Queen of Scots and her son King James VI of Scotland who became King James I of England and foiled the Gunpowder Plot.

name: Garfield in Disguise
summary_text: When Garfield and Odie are out trick-or-treating, they end up at a haunted house.

name: Horse Sense
summary_text: After treating his rancher cousin shoddily in L.A. Michael Woods is sentenced by his parents to spending a month on the ranch with his cousin and aunt.

name: Sade
summary_text: A man prepares himself to be transferred to a detention center and rest home where he will relive one more time the highlights of his youth.

name: Pédale douce
summary_text: The film discusses how to save a marriage when one is surrounded by heterosexual as well as homosexual people ?

name: Olivier, Olivier
summary_text: Olivier, the nine-year-old son of Elisabeth and Serge, a country veterinarian, vanishes one afternoon on the way to his grandmother's house. The emotional aftermath of his disappearance ...                See full summary »

name: Maciste e la regina di Samar
summary_text: Hercules is summoned to oppose the evil Queen Samara, who has allied herself with aliens and is sacrificing her own people in a bid to awaken a moon goddess.

name: Deadline at Dawn
summary_text: When a woman he meets is murdered, a soon-to-ship-out sailor has until dawn to find the killer, aided by a weary dance hall girl.

name: Zjednoczone stany milosci
summary_text: Poland, 1990. The first euphoric year of freedom, but also of uncertainty for the future. Four apparently happy women of different ages decide it's time to change their lives, and fulfill their desires.

name: Robot Chicken: DC Comics Special
summary_text: The Robot Chicken DC Comics Special brings you the awesomeness of the DC Comics universe of characters as only Robot Chicken can, with amazing guest stars and the stop-motion sketch comedy you've come to love.

name: La vérité si je mens! 3
summary_text: The gang is back, leaving Paris' fading Sentier district for the thriving suburb of Aubervilliers, where they must share the market with Chinese wholesalers. All's well until they fall victim to the local Mafioso's scheme.

name: Vallavan
summary_text: Hero is happy guy until he meets a beautiful girl and falls for he.He disguises himself as unattractive guy to her and she too falls for him, film takes a twist when his ex returns and follows revenge and drama.

name: Don't Answer the Phone!
summary_text: A deeply disturbed Vietnam veteran terrorizes the young women of Los Angeles and taunts a radio psychologist with descriptions of his grisly crimes.

name: Girl Crazy
summary_text: A young philandering playboy is sent to a College, somewhere in the American West, and organizes a show, together with his sweetheart, to save the college from closure due to falling enrollments.

name: H.O.T.S.
summary_text: College exploitation film focusing on the wild escapades of the women of H.O.T.S. Sorority. The antics include but are certainly not limited to a wet t-shirt contest, a sky-diving episode, ...                See full summary »

name: The Seventh Veil
summary_text: A concert pianist with amnesia fights to regain her memory.

name: Love Finds Andy Hardy
summary_text: Andy has problems raising the last payment for a used car and juggling three pretty girls with an upcoming country club dance scheduled.

name: Pig
summary_text: Iranian directors are getting slaughtered by an unknown serial killer and a blacklisted director, Hasan Kasmai, is curious about only one thing: Why isn't the killer after him?

name: The Next Skin
summary_text: A teenager who went missing and was presumed dead returns home after eight years to find a family deeply affected by his disappearance. Gradually, doubts arise about whether he really is the missing boy or an impostor.

name: A Borrowed Identity
summary_text: A Palestinian-Israeli boy named Eyad is sent to a prestigious boarding school in Jerusalem, where he struggles with issues of language, culture, and identity.

name: Hansel & Gretel: Warriors of Witchcraft
summary_text: Twins discover a coven of witches. The brother is recruited to join while the sister uncovers their heritage as witch slayers. When the brother is supposed to sacrifice his sister they instead team up to destroy the Witch of the Woods.

name: E=mc2
summary_text: The film tells about mainly three people - Max, a bored, smart, poor University Professor of Philosophy; Ramzes, a mafia leader, cool, strong, merciless bully and Stella, Ramzes girlfriend.

name: Amy's Orgasm
summary_text: Story of a 29-year-old Ivy League-educated, self-help author as she grudgingly falls for a shock-jock radio host with a reputation for hitting on his bimbo guests.

name: Lisa
summary_text: A flirtatious teenager with an eye for older men gets more than she bargained for when the handsome stranger she's pursuing turns out to be a serial killer.

name: Snowbeast
summary_text: A Colorado ski resort is besieged by a sub-human beast that commits brutal murders on the slopes.

name: Les noces rouges
summary_text: Lucienne Delamare and Pierre Maury are having an affair. Lucienne's husband Paul is the mayor, and a French deputy. Pierre's wife Clotilde has been weak and sickly for years. Lucienne's ...                See full summary »

name: Love on the Slopes
summary_text: A less than daring aspiring travel writer tries out extreme sports in order to write a magazine article, with the help of an extreme sports photographer. As usual, love ensues.

name: Rajma Chawal
summary_text: An internet-rookie father attempts to use social media to enhance his faltering relationship with his millennial son.

name: The Leisure Class
summary_text: William is a debonair Englishman celebrating his upcoming marriage to Fiona, the beautiful daughter of a United States senator and renowned East Coast family. Yet William is a con man with ...                See full summary »

name: Paradise
summary_text: Follows three people whose paths cross during a terrible time of war: Olga, a Russian aristocratic emigrant and member of the French Resistance; Jules, a French collaborator; and Helmut, a high-ranking German SS officer.

name: Os Gatos Não Têm Vertigens
summary_text: An 18 year old boy with a complicated life starts a criminal career but ends up on a rooftop of Lisbon. On the apartment below lives a recently widowed, lonely old lady. Against all odds ...                See full summary »

name: Home Sweet Home
summary_text: A young married couple comes home from a date night to discover that they are imprisoned in their own house with a methodical killer inside.

name: Snow
summary_text: Set in San Ernesto, California with only three days before Christmas, Nick Snowden needs to rescue a young reindeer from a zoo.

name: Storm Warning
summary_text: Marsha Mitchell, a traveling dress model, stops in a southern town to see her sister who has married a Ku Klux Klansman. Marsha sees the KKK commit a murder and helps District Attorney Burt Rainey in bringing the criminals to justice.

name: The Barretts of Wimpole Street
summary_text: Elizabeth Barrett's tyrannical father has forbidden any of his family to marry. Nevertheless, Elizabeth falls in love with the poet Robert Browning.

name: Animals
summary_text: Best friends Laura and Tyler fellow deviants, enablers and co-dependents. Laura is getting married and their booze and drug-fuelled Thelma and Louise life is in jeopardy and finds herself suspended between the two unable to give either up.

name: The Frozen
summary_text: An ill advised winter camping trip leaves a couple stranded deep in the mountains where they must survive against the forces of nature and hide from a mysterious man who hunts them.

name: Sønner av Norge
summary_text: It's not easy to rebel when your dad wants to join the party... One day (in 1979), Magnus and his son Nikolaj hit the wall in their new terrace house in Rykkinn. Magnus is an architect, ...                See full summary »

name: The Initiation of Sarah
summary_text: A college student uses her supernatural powers against a rival sorority house. A remake of the 1978 TV movie.

name: Uro
summary_text: Turning his back on a delinquent past and joining the police force, HP is determined to start doing the right thing. Soon he finds himself trapped in a web of lies, stretching out from both sides of the law. HP soon realizes that his present mission is closely connected to his own past, and that everything he worked so hard to escape from, is coming back to haunt him.

name: Alice et Martin
summary_text: A young man starts an affair with a woman - his brother's friend. Their relations are being tested because of obscure secrets hidden in the past.

name: Last Stand at Saber River
summary_text: After the Civil War, a returning Confederate veteran must reclaim his Arizona land and homestead from the Yankee carpetbaggers who illegally occupy it.

name: The Killer Nun
summary_text: Legendary Swedish sex bomb Anita Ekberg stars as Sister Gertrude, a cruel nun who discovers depraved pleasure in a frenzy of drug addiction, sexual degradation and sadistic murder.

name: Police Python 357
summary_text: An inspector is having a secret relationship with a woman. When she is murdered by his boss, all proof is against him.

name: Gay Purr-ee
summary_text: A farm cat moves to Paris in search of the high life while her wannabe lover from back home tries to reunite.

name: Grandma's Boy
summary_text: A meek young man must find the courage within when a rogue tramp menaces his home town.

name: Polladhavan
summary_text: A contemporary action drama that revolves around a young man's love affair with his bike, and the trials and travails is forced to undergo when it is lost.

name: The Foreigner
summary_text: A Frenchman falls in love with a hot temper Bulgarian village girl. Following the call of his heart he starts looking for the village where she lives without knowing the character and the language of the people living there.

name: The Guard Post
summary_text: (Korean with English subtitles) A squad of Korean soldiers is sent to investigate a guard post that overlooks the DMZ. Seemingly deserted at first, the squad eventually discovers mysterious...                See full summary »

name: Room of Death
summary_text: Two unemployed computer technicians discover 2 million euros next to a dead body in a field of windmills.
